statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT username FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, username, email, date_joined FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_joined >= '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE first_name = 'Alice' AND last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'Dr. Brown';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, description FROM courses WHERE course_id = '98765432-9876-5432-9876-543298765432';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' AND last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT username, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT material_title, description FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_results WHERE date_taken = '2022-01-15';

SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_title LIKE '%Database%';
SELECT result_id, user_id, quiz_id, score, date_taken FROM quiz_results WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY date_taken ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT course_name, instructor, description FROM course_materials WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, score, timestamp FROM quiz_results ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, material_url FROM course_materials WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, course_id, score FROM quiz_results ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_enrollments FROM enrollments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_enrollments > 2;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM CourseMaterials ORDER BY instructor DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(score) FROM QuizResults GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, material_url FROM CourseMaterials WHERE instructor IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, course_id, score FROM QuizResults WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
